name: Russian Prisoner VS Nazi Zombies
description: You are prisoner Artyomich, and you need to kill all the devils of the SS from Hell in order to save Russia from the apocalypse.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
